SquareButton
init
Build
BuildIcon
GlowAdd a glow element around the button graphic, and move the button to a higher layer
DeGlowRemove a glow element around the button graphic, and move the button to a lower layer
DeactivateChange the buttons display settings to a disabled state, also removing any active glows.
ActivateChange the buttons display sets to an enabled state.
HighlightAlias of Glow
DeHighlightAlias of DeGlow
Properties
isHighlightedFigure out if the button is currently “active” ie has a glow
isActiveFigure out if the button is currently an activatable target

Glow

public function Glow():void

Add a glow element around the button graphic, and move the button to a higher layer

DeGlow

public function DeGlow():void

Remove a glow element around the button graphic, and move the button to a lower layer

Deactivate

public function Deactivate():void

Change the buttons display settings to a disabled state, also removing any active glows.

Activate

public function Activate():void

Change the buttons display sets to an enabled state.
